Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Quantity|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
Quantity:(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Quantity#QuantityFHIR R5 ComplexType `Quantity` is representable via FHIR R4B extensions. Element `Quantity` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Quantity`.
Quantity.value (value):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Quantity#Quantity.valueElement `Quantity.value` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Quantity.value`.
Quantity.comparator (comparator):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Quantity#Quantity.comparatorNote that the target element context `Quantity.comparator` is a modifier element, so this extension does not need to be defined as a modifier. Element `Quantity.comparator` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Quantity.comparator`.
Quantity.unit (unit):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Quantity#Quantity.unitElement `Quantity.unit` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Quantity.unit`.
Quantity.system (system):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Quantity#Quantity.systemElement `Quantity.system` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Quantity.system`.
Quantity.code (code):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Quantity#Quantity.codeElement `Quantity.code` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Quantity.code`.

name: ConceptMapR5QuantityElementsForR4Quantity
title: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
description: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

target.comment:
FHIR R5 ComplexType `Quantity` is representable via FHIR R4B extensions.
Element `Quantity` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Quantity`.
Element `Quantity.value` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Quantity.value`.

Note that the target element context `Quantity.comparator` is a modifier element, so this extension does not need to be defined as a modifier.
Element `Quantity.comparator` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Quantity.comparator`.
Element `Quantity.unit` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Quantity.unit`.
Element `Quantity.system` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Quantity.system`.
Element `Quantity.code` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Quantity.code`.
